definition: surname Yi/alternative name for 絳|绛[Jiang4] capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)
wing/area surrounding the bullseye of a target/to assist/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/old variant of 翌

sentences.english: She was wearing a dress of diaphanous silk.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一件薄如蟬翼的綢服。

sentences.english: See the cage had been cicada wing, no result map Lutai.
sentences.chinese: 已見籠蟬翼，無因映鹿胎。

sentences.english: After a downpour, a cicada, its wings thoroughly soaked, could no longer fly.
sentences.chinese: 急雨之後，蟬翼溼得不能再飛了。

sentences.english: She wore a white organdy blouse.
sentences.chinese: 她穿著一件白色蟬翼紗上衣。

definition: to polish a text/rhetoric/ornate language/to use florid language to conceal errors/to gloss over
to be linked together/to be involved with/to collude/interconnection/involvement/collusion
to touch up (a piece of writing)/to add details (to a painting)
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
